mapper.select: SELECT recordId, wateredRegdate, wateringType, memberId FROM (SELECT recordId, wateredRegdate, wateringType, memberId, rownum AS rn FROM (SELECT recordId, wateredRegdate, wateringType, memberId FROM wateringRecord WHERE memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY recordId DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT wateredRegdate FROM wateringRecord WHERE memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY wateredRegdate DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wateringRecord (recordId, wateredRegdate, wateringType, memberId) VALUES (wateringRecord_seq.nextval, SYSDATE, '자동', #{memberId})
INSERT INTO wateringRecord (recordId, wateredRegdate, wateringType, memberId) VALUES (wateringRecord_seq.nextval, SYSDATE, '수동', #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(wateredRegdate, 'MM') AS month, SUM(CASE WHEN wateringType = '자동' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS autoCount, SUM(CASE WHEN wateringType = '수동' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS manualCount FROM wateringRecord WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND TO_CHAR(wateredRegdate, 'YYYY') = '2024' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(wateredRegdate, 'MM')
